definition: A reusable container made of fabric, typically used for carrying groceries, personal items, or other lightweight objects. It is commonly used as an eco-friendly alternative to plastic bags.

examples.german: Ich habe meinen Einkauf in einem Stoffbeutel transportiert.
examples.english: I carried my groceries in a cloth bag.
Cloth bags are more environmentally friendly than plastic bags.

examples.german: Meine Mutter hat mir einen Stoffbeutel genäht.
examples.english: My mother sewed a cloth bag for me.

examples.german: In dem Stoffbeutel sind meine Sportsachen.
examples.english: My sports equipment is in the cloth bag.

examples.german: Der Stoffbeutel hat einen praktischen Reißverschluss.
examples.english: The cloth bag has a convenient zipper.
